jump_scares.spoiler: After Kim says “Man, I hear voices all the time,” there is suddenly a loud cut to a man being stabbed
A few people jump out at the group from behind some bushes to scare them as a joke
A window at the back of the truck suddenly shatters as Kim is driving
As Jeff turns towards Kim, he suddenly turns into a burning electrocuted body in a vision
An owl suddenly flies through a window and it shatters
